description: Sets the number of days before the channel is automatically deleted.

parameters.name: ExpirationSettings
parameters.description: Settings that control the interval after which a channel is deleted. The period in days after which the system automatically deletes a channel. The conditions that must be met for a channel to expire.

nested_params.name: ExpirationDays
nested_params.description: The period in days after which the system automatically deletes a channel.

nested_params.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_params.description: The conditions that must be met for a channel to expire.

nested_items.name: ExpirationSettings
nested_items.description: Settings that control the interval after which a channel is deleted.

nested_items.name: ExpirationDays
nested_items.description: The period in days after which the system automatically deletes a channel.

nested_items.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_items.description: The conditions that must be met for a channel to expire.
